prompt.content: Calculate NextEra Energyâ€™s (NYSE: NEE) implied fuel cost per megawatt hour (MWh) for its FPL (Florida Power & Light) segment in FY 2024

messages.content:
[{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Pull NEE's FPL segment's fuel, purchased power, and interchange expense as $4188 million for 2024FY 

"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find FPL's total energy sales as 141.9 TWh for 2024. 
"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Convert FPL's total electricity sales (141.9 TWh) to MWh as 141.9x 1000000 =141900000 MWh"},{"criteria":"Calculate the fuel cost per MWh as 4188000000/141900000 = $29.5137 per MWh ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Round the final answer to the nearest two decimals = $29.51/MWh","operator":"correctness"}]
